mapper.select: select pr.plan_receive_plan_no, p.plan_title, p.plan_start_time, p.plan_end_time, m.member_name, pr.plan_receive_is_accept from plan_receive pr join plan p on pr.plan_receive_plan_no = p.plan_no join member m on p.plan_sender_no = m.member_no where pr.plan_receive_receiver_no = #{memberNo} order by p.plan_start_time asc

select pr.plan_receive_plan_no, p.plan_title, p.plan_start_time, p.plan_end_time, m.member_name, pr.plan_receive_is_accept from plan_receive pr join plan p on pr.plan_receive_plan_no = p.plan_no join member m on p.plan_sender_no = m.member_no where pr.plan_receive_receiver_no = #{memberNo} and pr.plan_receive_is_accept = 'Y' order by p.plan_start_time asc
select count(*) from plan_receive where plan_receive_plan_no = #{planNo}
